posts.post_title: FS: N28 Allen & Ginter Joseph Mulvey SOLD
posts.post_content:
For sale:  Allen & Ginter N28 Joseph Mulvey BVG graded 1 (presents better), asking $100 plus insured shipping.  SOLD

[url]cballantyne@hillfarrer.com[/url]

Cards received today, thanks for the quick ship, good packing and most importantly beautiful cards that came with the only surprise being they are a touch nicer in hand than the scans.  Thanks for working with me and a nice deal.
